title: Start
body:
<<unhide Lorelai>>
<<moveLeft Lorelai 120 80>>
<<hide Lorelai>>
<<hideLayer ruinsfrontdoor>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<disableCollisions Haia>>
<<unhide Haia>>
<<attachTo Mia Haia>>
<<moveToX Haia TopOfStairs 0 50>>
<<moveDown Haia 60 60>>
<<showLayer ruinsfrontdoor>>
<<pauseFor Haia 0.2>>
<<faceUp Haia>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.5>>
Haia: I hope the lady who went into the ruins didn't get herself hurt.
<<faceDown Haia>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
Haia: We have so many treasure hunter tourists who have no idea what they're up against..
Haia: ...
Haia: You know, beating a Fur Fur at your age with wooden swords is pretty impressive.
<<moveDown Haia 20 40>>
Renata-renatasmilingface: (Told you).
<<moveDown Haia 40 40>>
<<toMap blank 1>>
[[end]]
